mainHero.title: Welcome to CryptoDataMart
mainHero.subtitle: Empower Your CryptoDataMart Journey
mainHero.description: CryptoDataMart is a Blockchain-powered marketplace for the GenAI community, where users can buy, sell, and access AI models and datasets. It enables secure collaboration using smart contracts, with features like decentralized licensing and a playground for adding and discussing datasets, all while ensuring data privacy and security.

items.title: AI Model & Dataset Marketplace
items.description: Explore and trade AI models and datasets securely. Directly buy or sell resources, ensuring full ownership and transparency with decentralized licensing and blockchain-powered transactions.

items.title: Collaborative Playground
items.description: Add and share datasets, ask questions, and collaborate with the community. Our interactive playground fosters innovation, allowing users to test models and discuss solutions in real-time.

items.title: AI-Generated Dataset Descriptions
items.description: Each dataset listed on CryptoDataMart comes with an AI-generated description, providing detailed insights and context to help users understand and evaluate the data more efficiently.

items.title: Auto-Generated Tags for Datasets
items.description: When uploading datasets, CryptoDataMart automatically generates relevant tags, making it easier for users to discover and categorize datasets based on key characteristics and content.
